DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , non-randomized , pilot study determine safety feasibility insulin-only bionic pancreas .
DOC.brief_title: An Outpatient Study Automated Blood Glucose Control With Insulin-Only Bionic Pancreas
DOC.detailed_description: A total 16 subject , age 18-45 , enrol crossover study . The study consist three 7-day study arm follow order , one usual care arm , one bionic pancreas insulin arm static glucose target , one bionic pancreas insulin arm dynamic glucose target .
